roleset.name: to place in a new position, update

example.name: all arguments
example.text: So [CNN, a unit of Atlanta-based Turner Broadcasting System Inc.,]-2 is trying [*-2] to reposition itself as a primary channel , or what people in the television industry call [*T*-1] a `` top of mind '' network .
example.arg: as a primary channel , or what people in the television industry call [*T*-1] a `` top of mind '' network

predicate.note: Frames file for 'reposition' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.
